name: Space Place Resource Race
description:
You are a space engineer, trying to keep your spaceship from dying! Meanwhile a pesky AI keeps giving you orders...

  • A D - Left and Right.
  • SPACE / W - Jump
  • E / Left Click - Interact
  • Q / Right Click - Show Resource Tab
  • R - Reset your Game

Resource Usage:

  • Power can be drained to other systems. Don't use it all, or you'll have to go to the power banks to turn everything back on...
  • Radar doubles the effectiveness of your defences!
  • Defences take out enemies, at a heavy cost to power. Gain a damage boost at 100%!
  • Shield protects your hull from your enemies.
  • Hull takes damage once your shield is out. Can be slowly repaired. If it hits 0, the game is over!
  • Door power keeps the doors automatic. If it the power turns to 0, you'll have to start ripping them open!
  • Work away at computer terminals to gain your resources faster! 
  • The helpful as always AI keeps giving you suggestions... however they don't like it when they're ignored...

Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. Planned to have more features, but didn't plan as much as I should've done. Fairly happy for my first entry into a Game Jam.
